3. Michael Kors Rose Gold Tone Darci Women's Wristwatch MK3192 - 1480 AED
   Michael Kors Rose Gold Tone Darci Women's Wristwatch MK3192. Establish in the 1980s, American luxury fashion brand Michael Kors shot to international fame in the mid-2000s thanks to its glamourous line of accessories. Michael Kors watches are a must-buy for anyone with an eye for what they wear. Whether it's bought as a gift or a personal treat, you'll fall in love with your Michael Kors watch the instant it's on your wrist. Ladies rose gold metallic designs are one of the most popular on the market, followed be classic gold designs. These soft and delicate timepieces are ideal day-to-night wear, often accompanied with white leather accents and glowing stones around the face. More extravagant designs in yellow gold and silver make for head-turning accessories, ideal for a formal occasion. Men's watches are available in bright metallic along with dark leather, which makes for a stylish addition to a smart suit, or even semi-casual evening wear. Michael Kors is an American fashion giant specialising in dressing the jet-set with their unique brand of contemporary cool. Their sophisticated watch collection has been created with the fashion savvy in mind and includes a number of stunning designs. Bestselling Michael Kors watches for women are finished in classic gold, sleek silver or gorgeous rose gold, and include bold oversized styles, right down to dainty, classic designs featuring Roman numerals. The men's range is equally as desirable with understated classic looks featuring beautiful brown leather straps, and off-gold watches featuring intricate detailing and champagne dials.
